body.p:
STATE OF KENTUCKY.
Office of Quarter-Master General,
Frankfort, Ky. April 21 1865.
Dr. Governor
The Enclosed letter should have reached you this morning but was detained by accident --

I will come down to morrow afternoon ^from Lexington^ when I hope for an answer to the Enclosed letter Your speech in Louisville is much praised by all people -- an Excellent notice of it is this mornings LUnion Press --
Please prepare any thing you may ^wish^ to send to Washington and I shall be most happy to do you any service I can while at th Capitol

Your Svt
Jas S Brisbin
Brvt Brig Gen U S A
